data.title: Contact Us
data.meta_description: At Rentrak, we are dedicated to providing a professional service to our clients, discreetly and efficiently.
data.text:
Rentrak is a key provider of monitoring and recovery services to the vehicle tracking industry. Rentrak offers clients a total risk management solution incorporating vehicle monitoring and recovery, fleet bureau services, investigations, risk analysis and security audits.

Rentrak (Pty) Ltd is a member of the Private Security Industry Regulatory Authority (PSIRA). PSIRA Number 936709.
